name: femininely
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is feminine (= has characteristics that are traditionally thought to be typical of or suitable for a woman): The politician's supporters liked the fact that she was always dressed femininely. She was proud of her femininely curved figure.
More examplesFewer examplesI chose a more femininely shaped blouse than usual to wear with my outfit. She felt that she had been discriminated against in her career because she did not behave femininely enough.The character is presented as both femininely beautiful and boyish in her behaviour, by 19th century standards.
Related word
feminine
